summary: A powerful female barbarian follower to join you on your adventures!
descriptionHtml:
Rhowin Firebrand is a powerful follower located in Whiterun with the Companions in Jorrvaskr. She carries a hunting bow and a two handed fiery souls axe and will burn through your enemies (or just about anybody else you order her to) with great enthusiasm. 

Rhowin is essential, is available for marriage, and does not mind stealing/killing anyone you order.
author: Schtolteheim89
